column5: Picked up my 3 yr old grand daughter in Toronto about 1:30 today back home by 4pm, off to fishing from 4:30 til 6:30, cloudy, windy and cool but we managed 10 sunfish and rockbass, she even kissed a few, video camera will be with us the rest of the week with tripod, hopefully the weather cooperates Richard  (papa) 2nd grand daughter born May 17 4am 7lb 12oz Rowan Marinka, took holiday's to give my daughter a break til friday with new born only
Congrat's Richard....Grandchildren are a wonderful thing!

Thanx guys my computer crashed & my son-in-law is just getting it going again, was out Tues Wed Thurs Fri Sat and maybe tommorrow, having a blast with my grand daughter pictures to follow, as soon as we get the programs reloaded Richard
You're a young looking Grandpa Richard you must be wearing make up again  Good on you for taking the little one out now send us some pics will ya
